CustomField.description: Clone of Channel_Payment_Method_V2__c by replacing rvpe fields with partner portal field
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR(
AND( ISPICKVAL(Partner_Account_lr__r.Partner_Program_Tier__c, "Dynamic Fleet (Sales)"), OR( CONTAINS( Fleet_Segment__c ,"Commercial"), AND( CONTAINS( Fleet_Segment__c , "Enterprise"), Partner_Account_lr__r.Qualifies_for_Resale_in_Fleet_Enterprise__c = false ) ) ),
OR( ISPICKVAL(Partner_Account_lr__r.Partner_Program_Tier__c, "Agile Fleet (Sales)"), ISPICKVAL(Partner_Account_lr__r.Partner_Program_Tier__c, "Industrial Referral (Sales)"), ISPICKVAL(Partner_Account_lr__r.Partner_Program_Tier__c, "Fleet Insurance Referral") ) ),
"Rebate (% MSRP)", IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Partner_Account_lr__r.Partner_Program_Tier__c, "Dynamic Fleet (Sales)"), CONTAINS( Fleet_Segment__c ,"Mid-Market") ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Partner_Account_lr__r.Partner_Program_Tier__c, "Dynamic Fleet (Sales)"), CONTAINS( Fleet_Segment__c ,"Enterprise"), Partner_Account_lr__r.Qualifies_for_Resale_in_Fleet_Enterprise__c = true ), ISPICKVAL(Partner_Account_lr__r.Partner_Program_Tier__c, "Industrial Reseller (Sales)"), ISPICKVAL(Product_Interest_Type__c, 'Onsite Security Cameras') ), "Deal Registration Margin", IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Partner_Account_lr__r.Partner_Program_Tier__c, "Fleet Insight (Insurance)"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product_Interest_Type__c, 'Onsite Security Cameras')) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Partner_Account_lr__r.Partner_Program_Tier__c, "Fleet Control (Insurance)"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product_Interest_Type__c, 'Onsite Security Cameras')) ) ), "End Customer Discount", "None" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Channel Payment Method
